== Changes From Previous Version ==
====Updates on November 16, 2012 - USGS EROS====
  * lndpm
    # Modified to DIE vs. WARN if the ancillary products (REANALYSIS, EP/TOMS, or DEM) do not exist.
- Modified the metadata filename to be *.metadata.txt vs. *.carbon_met.txt.

  * lndsr
    # Modified to make sure no other QA bits are set on if the current pixel is a fill pixel.

  * lndsrbm
    # Modified to use the fill_QA band to determin if the current pixel is fill.
    # Cloud-related QA pixels are not set to on if the current pixel is fill.
    # Added error checking to the file write/close tasks.
    # Use snfindex from the HDF libraries to find the index of the specified SDS rather than relying on hard-coded SDS index values.

  * bin
    # Added a do_ledaps.py script for better scripting control.
